title: Starts of the Week + Week 1 Breakdown, It’s Football Time!  - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/9
description:
It’s football time! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode as the 2021 NFL season kicks off! On today’s fantasy football podcast, get Starts of the Week from Andy, Mike, and Jason! Plus, a number of matchup breakdowns, and a new edition of “Never Not Working!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 9th, 2021.
  
 (04:10) - Never Not Working (Rookie WRs)
 (09:10) - NFL News
 (16:20) - Fantasy Forecast
 (17:20) - Eagles at Falcons
 (25:05) - Steelers at Bills
 (31:40) - Vikings at Bengals
 (36:30) - 49ers at Lions
 (42:10) - Cardinals at Titans
 (46:30) - Seahawks at Colts
 (50:45) - Starts of the Week
 (51:00) - QB Starts of the Week
 (52:40) - RB Starts of the Week
 (55:10) - WR Starts of the Week
 (57:15) - TE Starts of the Week
 (59:50) - Boom Boom Kicker of the Week
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
